channel.title: Pretty good day, imo
channel.description:
Anyway, I have finally had a turn of luck and had a ripper of a day, I'm stoked mate. It's junk-day in our district, and someone down the road was throwing a 52inch T.V out, and all that was wrong with it was that the cord didn't work. I went to the shop and brought a cord and asked if I could have the T.V, and they said it was fine and that the cord wasn't working, etc.
So I took it home, fixed it up and put it into my room. Mind you, this T.V is easily $1500+ AUD. Then, my dad got a phone call from his mate, who owns a game shop, or something like that. Anyway, he said he had a xbox 360 elite, newest version, never opened. He just needed to get rid of it, and dad had done a massive plumbing job for him in like '03 for free. He said dad could have it for me, and we could just have it if dad shouted the drinks at the pub. So, at this point I've got a 360 which had 2 controllers, xbox live vision, 3 month xbl and best of all Call of Duty 5, and a plasma T.V. (ps, I went and brought Call of Duty 5 today with my money I had saved from working).
And, tomorrow I am going to go and pick my laptop up which has been payed for, for Christmas of course. Best thing, I'm home alone for 2 days as mum is down at some conference, and dad is working. So when dad comes back from the pub, probably fucking full of piss, expecting me to only have the 360, he'll be surprised :D
I do realize that this may be the best day of my life, and that it's about time I got some good luck after losing my bike :D I don't know what I did to deserve a day like this, but oh well.

item.title: Pretty good day, imo
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

I’m jelous, recent spend 2000$ AU on a 50" plasma with 5 yr warrenty, gratz on the win… now expect a kick to the nuts tomorrow, some homeless guy pissing on you while you sleep, then your goods stolen back off you.

Read full topic

item.title: Pretty good day, imo
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:50, topic:245771”][quote author=h44ckzor pwnage link=topic=322238.msg2550924#msg2550924 date=1227513455]
The $1000 for Aussies is actually a payment from the government to all Aussie families on Tax Benefit A which is for low income earners and it’s deliberately at Christmas time.
[/quote]
Actually, not so.

My mum gets $1000 per kid as she is a single parent, and the government have decided to give all single parents $1000 per kid, hoping they will spend it at shops, thus generating business.[/quote]
h44 (whatever his name is) is also right. Tax benefit.

My Mum’s getting it too, and we got our Tax Return of $3000 earlier this year. <3

Read full topic

item.title: Pretty good day, imo
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=“TeleNubby, post:41, topic:245771”]Haha nice Yz! <3
Great turn of events since your bike was stolen.

Coincidentally, after saying no the last two dozen times, my parents decided to hook me up with a new phone and unlimited texting for my birthday next saturday. To top that, I was so close to getting a new 52" flat screen for my room to go along with the PS3, but we havent gotten the setup right yet (mounts, etc.) so we’re waiting on that.

I love good days.[/quote]

I wish I had a tv bigger then 32"…

Lucky shit.
